cards.title: Photo highlights / From Afghanistan and the West Bank to wild horses in Spain
cards.rawTitle: From Afghanistan and the West Bank to wild horses in Spain

item.title: Photo highlights of the day, from Afghanistan and the West Bank to Spain
item.trailText: The Guardian’s picture editors bring you a selection of the best photographs from around the world
item.standFirst: The Guardian’s picture editors bring you a selection of the best photographs from around the world, including a roundup of wild horses in Spain and hot weather in Afghanistan and defiance of Israel’s separation barrier in the West Bank

displayImages.caption: El Rocío, Spain The annual saca de las yeguas, or roundup of wild mares Photograph: Cristina Quicler/AFP/Getty Images
displayImages.altText: El Rocio Horses run through the village of Rocio during the annual Saca de las Yeguas round up of the wild mares
displayImages.cleanCaption: El Rocío, Spain The annual saca de las yeguas, or roundup of wild mares

displayImages.caption: Del Mar, California A woman is served at one of the many foodstalls at the annual San Diego county fair Photograph: Mike Blake/Reuters
displayImages.altText: Del Mar, California, USA A woman is served her order at one of the many food stands at the annual San Diego County Fair
displayImages.cleanCaption: Del Mar, California A woman is served at one of the many foodstalls at the annual San Diego county fair

displayImages.caption: Saint-Quentin-Fallavier, France Firefighters at the scene of an attack on the US company Air Products’ site in which at least one person was killed Photograph: Philippe Desmazes/AFP/Getty Images
displayImages.altText: Saint-Quentin-Fallavier, France French police and firefighters gather at the entrance of the Air Products company. An attacker carrying an Islamist flag killed one person and injured several others at a gas factory
displayImages.cleanCaption: Saint-Quentin-Fallavier, France Firefighters at the scene of an attack on the US company Air Products’ site in which at least one person was killed

displayImages.caption: Avdiyivka, Ukraine Workers at a coke plant that has been hit by about 230 rocket and artillery attacks since hostilities erupted between Kiev and pro-Russia separatists more than a year ago Photograph: Gleb Garanich/Reuters
displayImages.altText: Avdiyivka, Ukraine Workers at a coke plant in the town. The plant has been hit by about 230 rocket and artillery attacks since hostilities erupted over a year ago
displayImages.cleanCaption: Avdiyivka, Ukraine Workers at a coke plant that has been hit by about 230 rocket and artillery attacks since hostilities erupted between Kiev and pro-Russia separatists more than a year ago

displayImages.caption: Ayacucho, Peru People corral protected vicuñas for shearing in the Pampa Galeras national reserve Photograph: Sebastian Castañeda/AP
displayImages.altText: Ayacucho,Peru Highland Indians corral protected vicunas on an Andean plain in the Pampa Galeras National Reserve
displayImages.cleanCaption: Ayacucho, Peru People corral protected vicuñas for shearing in the Pampa Galeras national reserve

displayImages.caption: Berlin, Germany The Queen greets members of the public at the end of her three-day visit to Germany Photograph: Fabrizio Bensch/AFP/Getty Images
displayImages.altText: Berlin, Germany Queen Elizabeth II greets members of the public at the Pariser Platz  as she ends her three-day visit to Germany
displayImages.cleanCaption: Berlin, Germany The Queen greets members of the public at the end of her three-day visit to Germany

displayImages.caption: Dhaka, Bangladesh Muslims attend Friday prayers at the Baitul Mukaram mosque Photograph: A M Ahad/AP
displayImages.altText: Dhaka, Bangladesh Muslims attend Friday prayers at the Baitul Mukaram national mosque during the Islamic holy month of Ramadan
displayImages.cleanCaption: Dhaka, Bangladesh Muslims attend Friday prayers at the Baitul Mukaram mosque

displayImages.caption: Jalalabad, Afghanistan People cool off as temperatures reach 41C Photograph: Noorullah Shirzada/AFP/Getty Images
displayImages.altText: Jalalabad, Afghanistan Youth cool off on a hot day as temperatures reach around 41 degrees celsius
displayImages.cleanCaption: Jalalabad, Afghanistan People cool off as temperatures reach 41C

displayImages.caption: Al-Ram, West Bank Palestinians use a ladder to climb over Israel’s separation barrier on their way to pray at the Al-Aqsa mosque in Jerusalem Photograph: Majdi Mohammed/AP
displayImages.altText: Al-Ram Palestinians use a ladder to climb over the separation barrier with Israel on their way to pray at the Al-Aqsa Mosque in Jerusalem
displayImages.cleanCaption: Al-Ram, West Bank Palestinians use a ladder to climb over Israel’s separation barrier on their way to pray at the Al-Aqsa mosque in Jerusalem

displayImages.caption: Seoul, South Korea A woman cleans the windows of a traditional hanok-style house Photograph: Ed Jones/AFP/Getty Images
displayImages.altText: Seoul, south Korea A woman cleans the window of a traditional hanok-style house
displayImages.cleanCaption: Seoul, South Korea A woman cleans the windows of a traditional hanok-style house

displayImages.caption: Rio de Janeiro, Brazil French and Brazilian special forces take part in the simulation of a hostage rescue Photograph: Christophe Simon/AFP/Getty Images
displayImages.altText: Rio de Janeiro, Brazil A member of the French GIGN special forces, right, joins the Brazilian elite military police unit in the simulation of a hostage rescue operation, at their headquarters
displayImages.cleanCaption: Rio de Janeiro, Brazil French and Brazilian special forces take part in the simulation of a hostage rescue

displayImages.caption: Martonos, Serbia A group of migrants from Syria walk towards the border with Hungary Photograph: Andrej Isakovic/AFP/Getty Images
displayImages.altText: Martonos, Serbia A group of migrants from Syria walk towards the border with Hungary
displayImages.cleanCaption: Martonos, Serbia A group of migrants from Syria walk towards the border with Hungary

displayImages.caption: Beijing, China Brightly coloured snails for sale at a pet market Photograph: Wu Hong/EPA
displayImages.altText: Beijing, China Brightly coloured snails for sale at a pet market
displayImages.cleanCaption: Beijing, China Brightly coloured snails for sale at a pet market
